channel.title: Changing logout text
channel.description:
hey guys. i want to change what is says when you are attempting to log out, heres a pic of logout screen:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/logoutchange.jpg[/img]
the text circled in pink is the text i want to edit when someone attempts to log out. can some1 help me plz?

item.title: Changing logout text
item.dc:creator: @angelovanhem angelovanhem
item.description:
@angelovanhem wrote:

client.java is found in your server’s source folder. open it with notepad. press ctrl-f and search for Boolean Process. if you find that you need to make space under it and paste this:
sendQuest(“put”, 2450); {
sendQuest(“your”, 2451);
sendQuest(“text”, 2452);
sendQuest(“here !!”, 2458);
}
do not forget the { and } or t wont work.
put your text between the " "
save it and press the compiler in the source folder.
run your server and check it
if you need help pm me.

goodluck!

Read full topic

item.title: Changing logout text
item.dc:creator: @H_tler H¡tler
item.description:
@H_tler wrote:

In Boolean Process

add

sendQuest("When you have finished playing", 2450); sendQuest("RuneScape, always use the", 2451); sendQuest("button below to logout safely.", 2452); sendQuest("Click here to logout", 2458);
